scripts.build: npm run build:dev:pc && npm run build:dev:mobile
scripts.build:dev:pc: npm run clean:pc && vue-cli-service build --mode pcDevelopment
scripts.build:test:pc: npm run clean:pc && vue-cli-service build --mode pcTest
scripts.build:master:pc: npm run clean:pc && vue-cli-service build --mode pcProduction
scripts.build:dev:mobile: npm run clean:mobile && vue-cli-service build --mode mobileDevelopment
scripts.build:test:mobile: npm run clean:mobile && vue-cli-service build --mode mobileTest
scripts.build:master:mobile: npm run clean:mobile && vue-cli-service build --mode mobileProduction
